Articles.Content:
I am currently working with a friend on a RCS part, I just started up the game successfully went to put the part on to see it and this happened.

I would love to have feedback and help to release this part!

http://imgur.com/VkzTS
You didn\'t set 100 cm for the model, but 100 m, probably.
Is that something to change in the part.cfg file or to change it in Maya?
No, you must change it in maya.
What specificly do I need to change, the grid size?

If it\'s like Blender, and I see no reason why it wouldn\'t be, than you have to reduce the size of your part in Maya.

Can you set it to use meters as it\'s units of measurement? If you make a .5 radius part it should come out as 1m diameter.
Dont fix it... IT LOOKS LIKE A SPACE SHIELD I want the dl ???
